metadata.Title: CVE-2020-19131 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow in LibTiff v4.0.10 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via the "invertImage()" function in the component "tiffcrop".

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-19131` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.7
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.7
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.7
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.7
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> reproducer causes an out-of-bounds read, so DoS only

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.7').
